channel.title: Home on Vinícius Dias
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Vinícius Dias

item.description: Samuel Ferraz, Vinícius Dias, Carlos H. C. Teixeira, Srinivasan Parthasarathy, George Teodoro, Wagner Meira Jr. (2024). DuMato: An eﬃcient warp-centric subgraph enumeration system for GPU. Journal of Parallel and Distributed Computing (JPDC'24). PDF DOI code
Nestor D. O. Volpini, Vinicius Dias, Dorgival Guedes. Uma Análise Multicamadas do Consumo de Energia em Cargas Big Data. XXV Simpósio em Sistemas Computacionais de Alto Desempenho (SSCAD'24). PDF DOI

[best paper nomination] Vinicius Dias, Samuel Ferraz, Aditya Vadlamani, Mahdi Erfanian, Carlos H. C. Teixeira, Dorgival Guedes, Wagner Meira Jr., Srinivasan Parthasarathy (2023). Graph Pattern Mining Paradigms: Consolidation and Renewed Bearing. 2023 IEEE 30th International Conference on High Performance Computing, Data, and Analytics (HiPC'23). PDF DOI code

Samuel Ferraz, Vinícius Dias, Carlos H. C. Teixeira, George Teodoro, Wagner Meira Jr. (2022). Efficient Strategies for Graph Pattern Mining Algorithms on GPUs. 2022 IEEE 34th International Symposium on Computer Architecture and High Performance Computing (SBAC-PAD'22). PDF DOI code

Vinicius Dias, Carlos H. C. Teixeira, Dorgival Guedes, Wagner Meira Jr., Srinivasan Parthasarathy (2019). Fractal: A General-Purpose Graph Pattern Mining System. Proceedings of the 2019 International Conference on Management of Data (SIGMOD'19). PDF DOI code
Vinicius Dias, Wagner Meira, Dorgival Guedes (2018). Janus: Diagnostics and reconfiguration of data parallel programs. Journal of Parallel and Distributed Computing. PDF DOI code

Eslam Hussein, Abdurrahman Ghanem, Vinicius Dias, Carlos H.C. Teixeira, Ghadeer AbuOda, Marco Serafini, Georgos Siganos, Gianmarco De Francisci Morales, Ashraf Aboulnaga, Mohammed Zaki (2017). Graph Data Mining with Arabesque. Proceedings of the 2017 ACM International Conference on Management of Data (SIGMOD'17). PDF DOI code

Vinicius Dias, Rubens Moreira, Wagner Meira Jr., Dorgival Guedes (2016). Diagnosing Performance Bottlenecks in Massive Data Parallel Programs. 2016 16th IEEE/ACM International Symposium on Cluster, Cloud and Grid Computing (CCGrid'16). PDF DOI code

Vinicius Dias, Wagner Meira, Dorgival Guedes (2016). Dynamic Reconfiguration of Data Parallel Programs. 2016 28th International Symposium on Computer Architecture and High Performance Computing (SBAC-PAD'16). PDF DOI code

P. H. B. Las-Casas, V. S. Dias, W. Meira, D. Guedes (2016). A Big Data Architecture for Security Data and Its Application to Phishing Characterization. 2016 IEEE 2nd International Conference on Big Data Security on Cloud (BigDataSecurity'16). PDF DOI

Marcos Roberto Ribeiro, Fabíola Souza F. Pereira, Vinícius Vitor S. Dias (2016). Efficient Algorithms for Processing Preference Queries. Proceedings of the 31st Annual ACM Symposium on Applied Computing. PDF DOI

Rodrigo Rocha, Bruno Hott, Vinícius Dias, Renato Ferreira, Wagner Meira, Dorgival Guedes (2016). Watershed-ng: an extensible distributed stream processing framework. Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience. PDF DOI

Pedro H. B. Las-Casas, Vinicius Dias, Renato Ferreira, Wagner Meira Jr., Dorgival Guedes (2014). A Hadoop Extension to Process Mail Folders and its Application to a Spam Dataset. 2014 International Symposium on Computer Architecture and High Performance Computing Workshop. PDF DOI

item.title: Links
item.description:
Computation

  • [pt-br] Por onde vem a internet?. Vídeo introdutório muito interessante mostrando, em alto nível, como a internet funciona.

Learning and education

  • [pt-br] Podcast Naruhodo! #205. Diferença entre “entender” e “aprender”. Discute e critica métodos de aprendizagem com base em estudos científicos: muito interessante, muito prático.

Music

  • [en] Sunday Baroque. Classical Baroque Music for fun and profit.

item.title: Students
item.description:
current

–

  • [2025] [masters] Bruna Galdêncio
    • georeferenced data ; nature-based solutions ; graph learning

–

  • [2025] [undergrad] Diogo Carvalho
    • subgraph optimization ; parallel computation
  • [2025] [undergrad] Jean Diniz
    • LLM ; RAG ; Graph RAG ; document search
  • [2025] [undergrad] Paulo Carvalho
    • LLM ; text-to-graph ; experimental evaluation
  • [2024] [undergrad] Helio Silva
    • compression ; data structure ; biological graphs

–

item.title: Teaching
item.description:
Courses material

  • Algoritmos: Notas e Compilações (PDF). Em construção, utilizada em disciplinas de projeto e análise de algoritmos [pt-br]
  • Algoritmos: Notas e Compilações (www). Em construção, utilizada em disciplinas de projeto e análise de algoritmos [pt-br]

Courses
